page.title: Verify your email address
page.header: Check your inbox for a six digit verification code
page.description: Thank you for your interest in the CSC-CPP pilot, please enter the verification code sent to you to validate your email. If you can't access your email at the moment, press "I will do this later" and click the validation link from the email directly at a later time.

page.title: Email verification's code incorrect
page.header: The code you've entered is incorect
page.description: Try clicking the link sent to your email, if this still doesn't solve the issue, contact us at <0></0>

page.title: Email verification's validated
page.header: Thank you for validating your email address
page.sub-header: Your application process is now complete
